title: Who sold more records the Beatles or The Rolling Stones? - Quora

response.answer_text: The Beatles outsold every single group and person who have produced music and records in the history of recording!!! All told, the Beatles have sold 1.6 BILLION singles in the United States, and 177 million albums. The number of Beatles singles to reach Number 1 on the "Billboard Hot 100" is 21, the most of any band. “It’s still difficult to fathom just how many records The Beatles have moved over the years. For example, the band’s White Album (24 million) sold more copies than the entire Jimmy Hendrix discography. That brings us to the comparison with the Rolling Stones, the Fab Four’s supposed “rivals” in the 1960s. If you go by record sales, the Stones boast only a fraction of the Beatles’ numbers. In fact, if you add the Stones’ figures to the output of the massive-selling Led Zeppelin, they still come up short. The Rolling Stones sold 66.5 million records to Led Zeppelin’s 111.5 million. Which in turn is well short of The Beatles 177 million! The Beatles Rule!

The 50 best-selling music artists of all time 25 Top Selling Music Artists Of All Time The Beatles are the best-selling group of all time, and Led Zeppelin are the next-best (with various solo artists like Presley, Garth Brooks and Michael Jackson outselling them). The Rolling Stones are rather farther down in the list, despite their longevity.
